content: the panda c2c blanket is a free crochet pattern on my blog so adorable and easy this panda c2c throw would make the perfect unisex baby gift made with the mini half_double_crochet corner to corner c2c crochet technique for an approximate finished size of width 27 x height 33 could be made larger by using the double_crochet double_crochet c2c technique full color graph + written row by row pattern instructions provided beginner friendly with only 5 colors and minimal color changes all the photo & video tutorials provided to learn this fabulous color work technique
